text:
Agree with <@U02HBK93SPQ> on the solution mentioned above. It looks safer to access the final blockquote element through the compound selector if you want some specific blockquote to have a specific design.

I’m wondering what your use case is <@UBT0AHWLD>?
I’m currently working on theme and planning to stylize the blockquote for any use in the theme like this
`blockquote {`
  `some css declarations`
`}`
is the old marketplace still accepting code updates to modules?

We are excited to announce Zoho Sign Integration for HubSpot CRM. With ZohoSign Integration, Salespersons can create, send and track ZohoSign envelopes directly from HubSpot. Your team can track the status of these documents without having to leave HubSpot.
 
Interested in Early Access? Click the below link to install the extension.
 
<https://api-osync.oapps.xyz/app/zoho_sign/authorize/index.html|ZohoSign - HubSpot Extension Install Link>
 
For any queries reach us - <mailto:help@oapps.xyz|help@oapps.xyz>
